attributes.action: Provide ID cards for everyone and state whether unemployed or employed for purposes of purchasing alcohol and cigarettes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I petition the Prime Minister to provide ID cards for all citizens of the United Kingdom which provides employment status.  If someone is unemployed they cannot purchase Alcohol or Cigarettes with tax Payers money. This is to reduce the burden of Taxation, reduce unemployment levels, decrease crime.
